order

Class CartController

  • java.lang.Object
    • order.CartController

  • public class CartController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to show our cart screen loads a list of all dishes in order user can remove items from cart
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matan Weisberg

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox cart_items_vbox
      cart_items_vbox = main vbox used to load each dish in order
      private MyListener cartItemListener
      cartItemListener = used for remove item option
      private javafx.scene.control.Button checkout_btn
      checkout_btn = button for proceeding to checkout
      private javafx.scene.control.Label total_price_label
      total_price_label = lbl sets the price of all items

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void checkout(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This func used for proceed to next screen (Order Information)
      void initialize()
      This func initializes our controller, sets the cart items each cart items is an appearance of CartItemScreen sets a listener for removing dish from cart
      private void setCartItems()
      This func used for setting the cart list loads cart item screen for each dish
